course_description: Explores what freedom entail in a political context, and what enables and frustrates its emergence. Texts range from 18th century to the present, including those by Kant, Arendt, Dr. King, Mill, Alcoff, Davis, Douglass, Beauvoir, Lorde, Douglass, and Obama.
sections: Class Nbr: 1916, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1:15-2:45p, Instructor: D. Huseyinzadegan, Status: Open
